channel.title: Creating a [317] ip changing client/regular client
channel.description:
how do i create my own 317 client for use with my server. how did somone customize a moparscape client like this guy?
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/downloads/171840-317-released-erics-ip-changer-released-317-a.html
i know this is a rune-server link but its a moparscape client so.....!
if a mod is reading this i have no intention to advertise rune-server im just using this link for a reference to the client i am talking about. and its your guys client =D!
how can i create my own ip changing client? i can use a regular client too!

item.title: Creating a [317] ip changing client/regular client
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

by getting user input and changing the connecting sock address.

Read full topic
item.source: Creating a [317] ip changing client/regular client
